About me (opens new window)

Readability, however, is emphasized above all else. A Markdown-formatted document should be publishable as-is, as plain text, without looking like it's been marked up with tags or formatting instructions.

While Markdown's syntax has been influenced by several existing text-to-HTML filters -- including Setext (opens new window), atx (opens new window), Textile (opens new window), reStructuredText (opens new window), Grutatext (opens new window), and EtText (opens new window) -- the single biggest source of inspiration for Markdown's syntax is the format of plain text email.
